response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and my proposal aims to strike a balance that benefits us equally. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $950,000. This offer not only reflects the true worth of the product but also allows you to secure it at a competitive price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any additional information. I am here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 950000}
